Factsheet

Developer:
Screen Smith Studios
Based in Silver Spring MD
Release date:
01 Mar, 2023
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
screensmith.net
Regular Price:
USD 7

Description

3D block puzzles built from pixel art! Push, pull, and climb on the blocks of a PictoPull puzzle in order to reach the goal. Create your own puzzles and share them!

History

Started Development in October 2021 as a personal project. Steam page was launched around July 2022. To be released on March 1st 2023. Most of development was done part time on weekends.

Features

  • 150+ puzzles spread across 10 different environments
  • Fully featured level editor. Create and share your own levels via Steam Workshop
  • Bonus Level Packs with 50+ levels and the ability to make and share your own level packs
